title: Voss' Silver Sword
content:
prototype for the contemporary githyanki silver sword was wielded during their rebellion against the mind flayers who enslaved them.

BG3 Voss' Silver Sword Information

Interplanar Slayer: This weapon grants a +1d4 bonus to Damage and Attack Rolls against githyanki, aberrations, fiends, and elementals. Wrathful Smite: Possibly Frightens your target. They will be easier to hit and cannot move. Range: 1.5 m
